title: SW Portland Photomap
name: SW Portland Photomap
description:
A Map by Jdchandler

It's another beautiful day so I will walk around downtown and get some pictures.

properties.name: Above Harrington's Saloon
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 2nd & Morrison, Portland ORSeptember 18, 1881 -- John Clark shot and killed by H.W. Lampert.

properties.name: Allan Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler2338 SW Madison, Portland, ORJuly 28, 1965 - Ruth Allan, 63, bound, gagged and shot to death. This is a registered Historical Landmark Charles Barker House 1930. King Hill Historic District.

properties.name: Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1228 SW Broadway, Portland ORDecember 7, 1951 -- Otis Hale, 30, stabbed to death with an ice pick in the apartment of June Murphy, 33. The ice pick was found in a near by parking lot.

properties.name: Apartment Building
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler351 1/2 SW Front, Portland ORJuly 27, 1931 -- Anna Morris, 44, beaten and strangled to death in an upstairs room.

properties.name: Apartment Building
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler807 SW 14th, Portland ORDecember 23, 1984 -- Apartment 8 -- Catbe Gutierrez, 55, beaten to death. i\'ll have to check and see if this is really the Freeway now.

properties.name: Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler2005 SW 5th, Portland ORDecember 18, 1940 -- Paul Notzold, 52, beaten with an axe and slashed with a straight razor in the apartment of Julia Carlson. She said she intended to commit suicide after the killing, but was found passed out drunk by the police.

properties.name: Arbor Court Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1329 sw 14th, Portland ORNovember 20, 1933 -- W. Frank Akin, independent auditor working for Governor Meier, shot to death. This is one of Portland\'s great mysteries and most historians say that it was never solved. One man was convicted of murder in this case and the person who pulled the trigger was probably executed for another crime. Soon I will tell this forgotten story.

properties.name: Avio Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler4209 SW Homestead Dr, Portland ORJuly 25, 1974 -- Monica Avio, 50, bound and shot to death in the storage room of her home during a burglary. i will have to do some research and find out why there is no house here now.

properties.name: Barrett & Levison Saloon
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler264 SW Alder, Portland OR1897-- Frank Williams shot to death. Barrett was convicted of murder. Levison was charged as an acessory after the fact. This whole block is now the ODS Building.

properties.name: Basement Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1915 SW Park, Portland, ORJan. 20, 1958 - Bessie Hammond, 36, strangled with a piece of her bathrobe. This is now Portland State University Campus the Peter Stott Athletic Center.

properties.name: Basement Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler220 1/2 SW Jefferson, Portland, OROct. 10, 1926 - Emma Henson shot to death.

properties.name: Boarding House
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler407 SW Stark, Portland ORNovember 19, 1915 -- John Linnd murdered in a room he shared with George Bartholomew. His body was put in a trunk and hauled to the Willamette River.

properties.name: Carlson Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler716 SW 15th, Portland ORAugust 6, 1975 -- Marleen Carlson, 44, strangled to death.

properties.name: Cecil Club
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler221 SW 6th, Portland ORJanuary 21, 1947 -- Capt. Frank Tatum beaten to death.

properties.name: Construction Site
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW Barnes Rd, Portland ORJanuary 10, 1990 -- Kiiko Morimoto, 31, and her children Miya,3, and Show, 9 months, strangled/smothered and buried here.

properties.name: Cornelius Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 523 SW Park, Portland ORDecember 30, 1984 -- Rose Marie Olson, 29, and both of her killers lived here. She was stabbed to death in Waterfront Park.

properties.name: Devillez Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1505 SW Clay, Portland, ORJuly 16, 1969 - Gary DeVillez, 24, shot to death. This block is now Clay St Commons Condominiums. The bottom picture shows where DeVillez\'s house was. The second picture is the Commons. The top picture shows Clay St 2 blocks east. The place where the Commons is now probably looked like this 35 years ago.

properties.name: Duke Hotel - 3rd Floor
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 409 SW 12th Ave, Portland, ORSept. 14, 1969 - Rosalie (Glenda) Hornsby, 30, abducted and beating started. Now it\'s the Whitney Gray Apartments. Jake\'s Famous Crawfish is on the ground floor and has been since 1890s.

properties.name: Fong Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler3405 SW Barbur, Portland ORFebruary 2, 1954 -- Diane Hank, 16, died after a drinking party in the home of local nighclub owner Way Hin (Wayne) Fong and his wife Shari. Her body was found dumped along the side of the Evergreen Highway near Washougal WA.

properties.name: Frank's Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler200 SW Salmon, Portland ORDecember 31, 1979 -- Charles Reynolds, 44, shot to death.

properties.name: Harrison Park
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 14th & Hall, Portland ORDecember 5, 1985 -- Lloyd Turner, 35, stabbed to death.

properties.name: Hillsdale Terrace Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler6745 SW 26th, Portland ORApril 30, 1999 -- Olga Lydia Ladezma, 24, stabbed to death.

properties.name: Hotel Hamilton
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 1024 SW 3rd, Portland ORJune 13, 1980 -- Marie Chin, retired, burned to death in an arson fire. May 4, 1992 -- Suzette Marie Britz, 22, beaten to death in room 219. This whole block is now the Mark O. hatfield Federal Courthouse.

properties.name: House Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1894 SW Morrison, Portland, OROct. 15, 1969 - Mark Anthony House, 27 months, starved to death by his parents. The whole block is gone now, swallowed by Civic Stadium (aka PGE Park).

properties.name: Jeffrey Parking Garage
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler911 SW 10th, Portland ORDecember 14, 1994 -- Roy Bray, 55, owner of Taylor\'s Cafe and Bakery at this address, stabbed to death in the parking garage next door to his business. Oscar Davis, 51, attenendant in the lot had been arguing with Bray about parking for months. Davis was not charged with a crime becasue the Grand Jury ruled he acted in self defense.

properties.name: King Tower Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler901 SW King, Portland, ORFeb. 2, 1965 - William Howell, 51, died of fractured skull.

properties.name: Leiner Shops
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler606 SW Alder, Portland ORJuly 2, 1976 -- Charles Stelling, 23, stabbed to death.

properties.name: Lewis Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler706 SW Park, Portland, ORSept 3, 1922 - Burglar shot at the residence of Allen Lewis, who was away. In the 1920s this must have been a pretty large house. Now it is a parking garage.

properties.name: Luckey Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler3405 SW Barbur, Portland ORAugust 16, 1946 -- Lester Luckey, 58, shot in the stomache by his wife, Myrtle, 51.

properties.name: Mark Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1117 SW 5th, Portland OROct. 5, 1955 - Mary Mark, 46, stabbed to death.

properties.name: McDevitt's Lodging House
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler438 SW Broadway, Portland ORApril 25, 1876 -- Edward Farrell shot to death.

properties.name: Merlotin Home
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSw 3rd & Yamhill, Portland ORDecember 22, 1885 -- Emma Merlotin hacked to death in her cabin. This was Portland\'s first murder mystery with a female victim. It is still unsolved.

properties.name: Miller Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1315 SW 14th, Portland OR, Portland ORDecember 16, 1945 -- Alice May Miller, 45, beaten and hacked to death with an axe and two hammers. Francis Gray killed himself with gas jet after killing Miller.

properties.name: Miller Hotel Room 305
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 415 SW Alder, Portland ORSept. 14, 1969 - Rosalie (Glenda) Horsnby, 30, beaten to death.

properties.name: Monument to Mayor Bud Clark
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW Jefferson & 18th Portland, ORI found this limerick about our ex-mayor inscribed in the sidewalk. "Whoop whoop" was the curious cheer Of a colorful barkeep near here This common tax payer Served two terms as mayor Then returned to his former career. Bud Clark Mayor of Portland 1984-1992

properties.name: Morlue Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler716 SW 15th, Portland OR December 15, 1979 -- Theophanes Morlue, 27, tortured until he signed over the title of his car and then stabbed to death.

properties.name: New Haven Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 920 SW 3rd, Portland ORMarch 4, 1969 -- Joe McKinnon Pierce, 50, and Lucy Ludlow, 55, residents died in a fire. Manuel Barrio, 50, charged with two counts of murder and arson, commited to mental hospital.

properties.name: New Ritz Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 1110 Sw Washington, Portland, ORDec. 29, 1958 - Leona Elaine McKillop, 39, strangled to death in a third floor room. "The damsel is not dead, but sleepeth." This is part of the historic Telegram Building. It looks like the office at this address is vacant. There is living space upstairs, but I couldn\'t tell if anyone lives up there.

properties.name: Old Glory Restaraunt & Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler411 SW Madison, Portland, ORJuly 8, 1959 - Clarence "Smoky" Williams, 44, stabbed to death. This whole block is now the Portlandia Building.

properties.name: Park Ave Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 623 Sw Park, Portland ORDecember 25, 1976 -- Sydney Fancourt, 54, of Vancouver BC strangled and beaten to death in his room.

properties.name: Parking Lot
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 2nd and Oak, Portland ORJune 7, 1998 -- Anthony C. Nnoli, 16, stabbed to death.

properties.name: Peck Tire Shop
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 925 SW 14th, Portland ORDecember 20, 1948 -- Harold Lynch, 25, shot to death by police after going "berserk" at work and threatening police with a knife. The Tire Shop was at the corner of SW 13th and Alder. When police arrived Lynch ran around the corner onto 14th and was shot in front of 925 SW 14th which is a parking lot next to an apartment building now. It was probably another apartment building in 1948.

properties.name: Penney House
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1832 SW 1st Ave, Portland, ORDewc. 26, 1960 - Mavis Ready, 20, beaten and strangled to death in upstairs bedroom.

properties.name: Phonebooth
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 5th & Oak, Portland ORDecember 4, 1990 -- Mari Lynn Sandoz, a desperate woman, shot to death by police.

properties.name: Pioneer Courthouse
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerPioneer Courthouse, Portland ORMarch 14, 1884 -- 200 spectators attended the execution of Johnson and Brown who had murdered Louis Joseph while robbing O\'Shea\'s Pawnshop.

properties.name: Public Park
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW Columbia & Park, Portland ORAugust 15, 1937 -- Herbert Ruef found dying of a fractured skull.

properties.name: Shooting
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSw 11th & Main, Portland ORDecember 8, 1919 -- Pvt. Mark Matthews, a soldier in transit from Camp Lewis to Corvallis, was shot to death on the sidewalk. The Army refused to cooperate with the investigation and this murder was never solved.

properties.name: Shootout
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler100 SW Hall, Portland ORDecember 20, 1911 -- Patrolman Charles Hewston was badly wounded in a gunfight with Frank "Tacoma Kid" Kelly. Kelly was also badly wounded. He was captured a short time after the shooting and died the next day. Officer Hewston recovered.

properties.name: Shootout in 1881
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW Front & Morrison, Portland ORJuly 4, 1881 -- Benjamin Cornelius killed by his son-in-law who was badly wounded.

properties.name: Sidewalk
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 5th & Yamhill, Portland OROctober 15, 1974 -- Joseph Hopkinson, a mental patient, shoot to death druing a struggle with three policemen.

properties.name: Sidewalk Robbery
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 2nd & Main, Portland OR1970 - Leroy D. Flishram, 55, stabbed to death during a robbery. Flishram struggled to his car and died there.

properties.name: Stabbing
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 1st & Clay, Portland ORDecember 11, 1955 -- Clifton Allie, 29, stabbed to death in an altercation with William Pippins, 23.

properties.name: Sterling Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler4525 SW Coronado, Portland ORNovember, 1983 -- Jeanne Sterling, 68, shot to death and her body set on fire.

properties.name: Street Shooting
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSw 2nd & Alder, Portland ORDecember 9, 1884 -- Quang Ho shot by Ping Ching.

properties.name: Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1311 SW 1st, Portland ORJanuary 18, 1940 -- John Ott, 59 stabbed during a fight. he staggered around the corner to a restaraunt at 206 SW Madison and died there.

properties.name: Taylor's Restaraunt
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSw 1st & Morrison, Portland ORJune 13, 1862 -- A man named Deman stabbed to death in an arguement with a man named Lincoln. Rumors said the killer was a relative of the President and he was never found.

properties.name: Western Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler17 SW 2nd, Portland ORMay 10, 1992 -- Jerome Richmond, 56, stabbed to death in room 410.

properties.name: Whitney Gray Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler409 SW 12th, Portland ORMay 14, 1993 -- Bobby Maes, 23, found dead in the utility room. Cause of death unknown.
